valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 14 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Sat 15 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 988 moving slowly eastwards, expected west FitzRoy 992 by midday tomorrow. Low Sole 998 expected 200 miles southwest of Sole 995
